data.Description: The weakest rankâ€”barely functional, often considered useless at this stage.
A rank that offers minimal utility, with little to no practical impact in most scenarios.
Slightly better than F-, but still lacks effectiveness or clear functionality.
Marginally improved, but still underwhelming. Often niche or overly situational in application.
A skill that shows improvement, though still far from ideal. Limited utility or overshadowed by better options.
The highest within the "E" tier, slightly more versatile but still requires more development to shine.
A skill that fulfills its basic purpose but lacks versatility or impact.
A functional skill that performs its role adequately but doesn't stand out.
A reliable skill that gets the job done but remains average in terms of effectiveness.
An average skill that balances utility and effectiveness, neither exceptional nor weak.
A balanced skill that can perform well under the right circumstances.
A solid skill with slightly above-average performance, offering good utility or impact.
A strong and dependable skill, offering significant value in most situations.
A robust skill that performs consistently well, often forming a core part of a strategy.
A high-performing skill with notable strengths, offering considerable advantages.
An advanced skill with high effectiveness, showcasing notable power or versatility.
A top-tier skill that provides excellent results, suitable for high-level scenarios.
A highly potent skill, almost unmatched in its tier, delivering remarkable impact.
A skill of extraordinary quality, offering impressive effectiveness and utility.
A superior skill that stands out for its exceptional performance and rare capabilities.
A skill of legendary quality, unmatched in effectiveness and often game-changing.
A rare and exceptional skill, surpassing most others in its power and expertise.
An elite skill that signifies extraordinary mastery, suitable for rare or critical situations.
A top-tier skill that exudes excellence, often unique and highly sought after.
A mythical skill of unmatched power, rivaled by very few in existence.
A legendary skill that defines mastery and excellence at an almost unparalleled level.
A divine-tier skill, representing the absolute pinnacle of expertise and performance.
Beyond mortal limits, this skill is the peak of mastery, representing perfection in every sense.
